content: @Josh Mandel this IG - cda-ccda-2.2 - built ok and you can see it here https://fhir.github.io/auto-ig-builder/builds.html but when you click the link it behaves differently to every other guide and takes you to the wrong directory?
Today when I click the link I'm taken to the right place; it's just there's no content because the build failed (https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/cda-ccda-2.2/build.log has the logging details).
the build had not failed at that time
